comments:
Create and run this example.

In the profiling navigator, create new sample items at all different levels 
including the agent level, etc.  Repeat this.  Eventually, the menu popup does 
not show "New Sample Item" as an option.  Also, the workbench from time to time 
can crash.

I attached the javacore dump file, that was generated upon the workbench crash.

Below are 3 different exceptions found in the .log file:
